段: 布尪仔戲，真趣味：孫悟空，大對耳，金箍棒是一枝著，豬八戒，大枝鼻，鼾鼾叫，欲食麵，羊仔行路頭攲攲，狗仔唱歌Do Re Mi，閣有貓仔挽荔枝，逐家看甲笑嘻嘻。

Poo3-ang1-a2 hi3,tsin1 tshu3-bi7:sun1-ngoo7-khong1,tua7tui3 hinn7,kim1-khoo1-pang7 si7 tsit8 ki1 ti7,ti1-pat4-kai3,tua7 ki1 phinn7,konn5-konn5-kio3,beh4 tsiah8 mi7,iunn5-a2 kiann5-loo7 thau5 khi1-khi1,kau2-a2 tshiunn3-kua1Do-Re-Mi,koh4u7 niau1-a2 ban2nai7-tsi1,tak8-ke1 khuann3 kah4 tshio3-hi1-hi1.
做陣[扌+舉]著青春這枝筆
M7-ko1 u7 li2 ka7 gun2 lai5 tsiau3-koo3
無論天偌烏雨會落偌粗
Bo5-lun7 thinn1lua7oo1 hoo7 e7 loh8lua7 tshoo1
Tsong2 tan2 u7 thinn1-tshinn1 lai5 tsio3 loo7
Li2 si7 tshun1-thinn1siong7 sui2 e5 hue1-lui2
為你我毋驚淋甲澹糊糊
Ui7li2 gua2 m7kiann1 lam5 kah4 tam5-koo5-koo5
Li2 si7 thinn1-ting2 siong7 kng1 hit4 liap8 tshinn1
為你我毋驚遙遠佮艱苦
Ui7 li2 gua2 m7kiann1 iau5-uan2 kah4kan1-khoo2
春天的春天的花蕊規山墘
U7 li2 tsiah4 u7 ho2 phang1-bi7
暗暝的暗暝的天星滿天邊
六月天日頭熁，鳳凰花紅帕帕，[虫+奄]蜅蠐枵飽吵，欲畢業的心啊挐漖漖。六冬學習真硬篤，天文地理讀透透，語文數學逐項[敖^力]，感恩的心啊若滇流。阮要感謝感謝學校用心共阮晟，感謝老師共阮惜命命，感謝同窗和好鬥陣行。阮欲喊喝，人生的路誠開闊，認真拍拚莫虛華，光明的未來等咱去行踏。

Lak8-gueh8-thinn1 jit8-thau5 hah4,hong7-hong5-hue1 ang5-pha3-pha3,am1-poo1-tse5 iau1-pa2-tsha2,beh4 pit4-giap8 e5 sim1ah4 ju5-ka3-ka3.lak8tang1 hak8-sip8 tsin1 nge7-tau2,thian1-bun5 te7-li2 thak8 thau3-thau3,gi2-bun5 soo3-hak8 tak8-hang7 gau5,kam2-un1 e5 sim1ah4 na2 tinn7 lau5, gun2 beh4 kam2-sia7kam2-sia7 hak8-hau7 iong7-sim1 ka7 gun2 tshiann5,kam2-sia7 lau7-su1 ka7 gun2 sioh4-mia7-mia7,kam2-sia7 tong5-tshong1 ho5-ho2 tau3-tin7 kiann5.gun2 beh4 han2-huah4,jin5-sing1 e5 loo7 tsiann5 khui1-khuah4,jin7-tsin1 phah4-piann3 mai3 hi1-hua1,kong1-bing5 e5 bi7-lai5 tan2lan2khi3 kiann5-tah8.
